page.title: 08ECONOMICS IN WGC.
page.content: The banks in our area are{ {Midland,Lloyds and TSB. }The WG.Branch of the Midland Bank started in {1928.} It employs {68 }people,has four computer terminals handling {10,026 } accounts. Lloyds employs {31.45 } people,and their computer links to Samson House in London.The TSB branch was opened in {1963 }and has 4 computer terminals. The building societies are the { {Halifax }and the{Gateway.}The WG branch of the {Halifax }was started in {1938 }and handles {25,000 }accounts,{ {32,000 }mortgages with {28 }staff. The {Gateway }building society open in {1975 }and employs{7 }people whose average age is {34.
